is-path-inside

Check if a path is inside another path

Install

$ npm install --save is-path-inside

Usage

var isPathInside = require('is-path-inside');

isPathInside('a/b', 'a/b/c');
//=> true

isPathInside('x/y', 'a/b/c');
//=> false

isPathInside('a/b/c', 'a/b/c');
//=> false
